definitions.definition: To restrict; not to allow to go beyond a certain bound, to set boundaries.
definitions.example: I'm limiting myself to two drinks tonight.

definitions.definition: To have a limit in a particular set.
definitions.example: The sequence limits on the point a.

definitions.definition: To beg, or to exercise functions, within a certain limited region.
An express train that only halts at a limited number of stops.
With certain (often specified) limits placed upon it.
Of numbers, amounts, data: poor, small, felt to be insufficient.
definitions.example: I have a limited understanding of quantum physics.
